hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: UI_branch
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the name of the UI branch

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Backend_branch
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the name of the Backend branch

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Build_Image
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the name of the docker build image which will be used to build binaries

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Container_Name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the name of the container in lower case, backup: you can put your name

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Service_pack_version
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the version of Service pack. Sample values will be like: 6.3.2.0

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Latest_dmap_image_version
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the latest version of DMAP image. Sample values be like:7.4.2.1

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Minimal_dmap_image_version
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter minimum version of DMAP image required to run these binaries. Sample values will be like: 7.4.2.0

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: Storage_location
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Enter the storage location to store Service pack which is BLOB

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Blob_Storage
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the Blob storage path for uploading the binaries. Sample values will be like dev: dmapdevreleases, qa: dmapqareleases, prod: dmapreleases

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: License_Required
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: True : then license module will be enabled, False: then license module will be disabled in binaries

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: sonarTypes
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the sonarQube issue types to certify the build

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: sonarSeverities
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the sonarQube issue severities to certify the build

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: VM_URL_for_binary_download
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the On Prem VM URL to download binaries from

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: OnPrem_Path
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: On Prem Path to copy the file Dev:dev QA:qa

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Fallback_Blob_URL_for_binary_download
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the fallback blob URL to download binaries from

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: Run_RestAssured_Test_Cases
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Configure this parameter to Yes if you want to automatically run RestAssured pipeline once this build is successful.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RestAssured_Ip
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the IP

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RestAssured_Port
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the Port

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RestAssured_Docker_Image
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the Docker_Image

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: Run_Modular_Test_Cases
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Configure this parameter to Yes if you want to automatically run ModulerTest pipeline once this build is successful.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Modular_Ip
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the IP

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Modular_Port
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the Port

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Modular_Docker_Image
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the Docker_Image

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: Run_Selenium_Suite
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Configure this parameter to Yes if you want to automatically run Selenium suite pipeline once this build is successful.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Selenium_branch
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the name of the selenium branch.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Master_Node_IP_Address
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Please Enter the DMAP Master Node IP Address of the server on which DMAP is running.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Worker_Node_IP_Address
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Please Enter the DMAP Worker Node IP Address of the server on which DMAP is running.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DB_Podman_Image
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter podman image name in which DMAP DB is running

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: APP_Podman_Image
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter podman image name in which DMAP APP is running

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Release_Version
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Please specify the DMAP build version

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: On_Prem_DMAP_Instance
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Please Specify On-Prem VM or Azure VM testing. Please specify Yes for On-Prem VM and No for Azure VM.

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: Selenium_Suite_Name
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Please specify the selenium suite name

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DMAP_License_Key
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Please specify the DMAP License Key for Activation

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: MigrationType
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Please specify Migration Type: App Migration or DB Migration

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: Change_in_binary_for
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Select App or DB if there is binary change in App or DB respectively, select Both if there is binary change in Both (App and DB)
